name: Enduro Extreme: Motocross, offroad & trial mayhem
name_original: Enduro Extreme: Motocross, offroad & trial mayhem
description:
Enduro and motocross racing game, with realistic motorcycle physics.
The enduro is an offroad motorbike specialty that is practiced in the natural environment with natural obstacles. It is also practiced in artificial tracks and with very difficult obstacles, which require a great dexterity with the motorbike and great physical strength. It's called extreme enduro. If you like the bikes racing games, this funny app is for you.
Ride the bike like a dirt track champion, jump, do pirouettes in the air, move forward and back to control the falls. You can also perform backflip for many turns, like in freestyle.
Climb the stones with trial maneuvers, but be careful with the balance. Climb the hills, climb the stones and all obstacles in a less time possible
